DOC.brief_title: Trenev Trio/Healthy Trinity Symptoms Diarrhea-predominant Irritable Bowel Syndrome ( IBS ) Functional Dyspepsia
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 18 75 year 2 . Diagnosed IBSD include : ) weekly average bad abdominal pain last 24 hour ≥3 010 scale , b ) weekly average Bristol Stool form ≥6 17 scale 3 . Diagnosed functional dyspepsia define presence least one follow symptom : bothersome postprandial fullness , early satiation , epigastric pain , epigastric burning AND evidence structural disease likely explain symptom 4 . History IBSD dyspepsia symptom least 12 week 5 . Agree use contraception throughout study period , unless postmenopausal surgically sterile ( female ) 6 . Able understand nature purpose study include potential risk side effect 7 . Willing consent study participation comply study requirement 8 . Successful completion 2week placeboonly runin period , define ≥90 % product compliance completion require questionnaires 1 . Major gastrointestinal complication , e.g . Crohn 's disease ulcer 2 . Prior abdominal surgery exception hernia repair appendectomy 3 . Subjects 60 year sigmoidoscopy colonoscopy past 10 year 4 . Clinically significant systemic disease 5 . Life expectancy < 6 month 6 . Pregnant female breastfeed 7 . Lactose intolerance 8 . Immunodeficient subject 9 . Antipsychotic medication within prior 3 month major psychiatric disorder within past 2 year 10 . Systemic steroid within prior month 11 . Current treatment nasogastric tube , ostomy , parenteral nutrition 12 . Use proton pump inhibitor 13 . Eating disorder 14 . Recent ( < 2 week ) antibiotic administration 15 . History alcohol , drug , medication abuse 16 . Daily consumption probiotic , ferment milk , and/or yogurt 17 . Known allergy substance study product 18 . Participation another study investigational product within 3 month screen
